item.description:
One of the newest BBLDers, Stephanie has suggested we dine in style at Eastern Standard.
I'm so glad she mentioned it because it's a place I've wanted to check out since last year.
Expect a lively atmosphere in the heart of Kenmore Square.
The Red Sox are away so the streets shouldn't be mobbed.

Eastern Standard Dinner Menu

Parking: On street as well as ample lot and garage parking. Call Eastern Standard (617) 532-9100 for suggestions.
MBTA: Green Line Kenmore Square

RULES of Engagement:

Please be considerate of your fellow diners time by arriving promptly.

Please bring enough cash to pay for your meal, drinks, tip, and tax.

All RSVP's are on a first come, first served basis.

You may only RSVP YES or NO. Maybe isn't an option.

Please RSVP YES only if you are certain you will attend an event.

If you're not sure you can attend because you have other unconfirmed plans or uncertain transportation, please RSVP NO with a comment requesting to be placed on wait list.

If an event is full and you wish to attend, please RSVP NO with a comment to be wait listed. If there is an overwhelming response, the reservation may be increased or another seating arranged.

If your name appears on the event page as a YES after the event and you have not attended the event, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If an organizer changes you're RSVP to NO because you haven't replied to final update event confirmation email deadline, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If any guests you've RSVPd for NO-SHOW it will count as if you've NO-SHOWED.

If you change your RSVP from a YES to a NO within twenty-four hours of the event, without an explanation, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If you are a NO-SHOW for three events you are removed from the group.

NO-SHOWS impact everyone; from you, who could or has been on the wait list to the organizer as well as the restaurant's who staff based on our reservation.

If it is less than twenty-fours from the meal and you are not able to attend or are running late, you must contact me directly by calling or texting 617 445-7549.

An email from you explaining your absence is an expected courtesy.

If you are removed and there were extenuating circumstances, please email me about rejoining.

Your feedback is appreciated so, rate the event and venue by completing surveys afterward.

I will arrive by 7:30 PM to confirm seating as well as welcome you.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Tonya/Meetup or call/text me on 617 445-7549
item.why: Fine dining in an American Brasserie

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Eastern Standard Dinner
